sentences.sContent: ...low-paid menial jobs, such as cleaning and domestic work.
sentences.sCn: …工钱少又卑微的工作，诸如打扫清洁或做家务。

synos.tran: 卑微的；仆人的；适合仆人做的
仆人；住家佣工；下贱的人

trans.tranCn: 卑微的；仆人的；适合仆人做的
trans.tranOther: Menial work is very boring, and the people who do it have a low status and are usually badly paid

trans.tranCn: 仆人；住家佣工；下贱的人
